title: Bill for Therapy Minutes
description: A speech therapist needs to bill for a 45-minute session, which requires using three different 15-minute billing codes.

tasks.description: Open the charge entry screen for the patient's therapy session.
Select the appropriate CPT code for the therapy provided.
tasks.expected_outcome: Therapist selects the correct billing code.

tasks.description: Enter '3' as the number of units for the code, corresponding to the 45 minutes of service, and submit the charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct number of units is billed, ensuring proper reimbursement.
